Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Waterfront Way, north of the Farmer's Federation Building.
Room.LongDescription: As with most farmers in modern societies, the farmers must form a sort of union where they can fight for their rights as a single entity instead of just a number of whining peasants. The Federation Building located to the south provides a meeting place for such events. The Klondike Wheat Fields are located to the north of the road.
